name: Agent-99
overview: Czechoslovakia 2072. A mafia style crime organization is planning a software attack on a company called Alkohol Soft. Your goal is to infiltrate the mob HQ and destroy their main computer, thus preventing the attack. Originally a Slovakian text adventure, this game was translated into English in 2021 as part of the Slovak digital games translation project by the Slovak Games Developers Association and Slovak Design Museum, funded by the Slovak Arts Council.
